import React, { Component } from "react"; import * as productApi from "../../apis/product"; import * as detailProductapi from "../../apis/detailProduct"; export default class SanphamItem extends Component { state = { sanpham: {}, giamoi: 0 }; async componentDidMount() { let sanpham = {}; let giamoi = 0; await productApi .findProductById(this.props.masanpham) .then((success) => { if (success.status === 200) { console.log(success.data); sanpham = success.data.value; } }) .catch((error) => { console.error(error); }); await detailProductapi .xemgiatheomasanpham(this.props.product.masanpham) .then((success) => { giamoi = success.data.value; }) .catch((error) => { console.error(error); }); this.setState({ sanpham: sanpham, giamoi: giamoi }); } render() { return (
  • {this.sanpham.tensanpham}
    (8 nhận xét)
    24.990.000 ₫
    25.350.000 ₫
    - {( 100 - (this.state.giamoi / this.state.sanpham.dongia) * 100 ).toFixed(0)} %
    • ); } }
